repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:9.10-alpine
COPY . /app

WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install --production --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && npm cache clean --force;
RUN npm install pm2 -g --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && npm cache clean --force;
RUN echo 'prod' > /app/config/env

EXPOSE 80 7000
CMD pm2 start server.js --no-daemon
